amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for maintaining, developing, or creating any Web site which disseminates information regarding energy efficiency and educational programs on energy efficiency specifically to children under 18 years of age.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for maintaining, developing, or creating any Web site which disseminates information regarding energy efficiency and educational programs on energy efficiency specifically to children under 18 years of age.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A080) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 233 (Roll no. 598).
